Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone, I'm Cool200 And I bought KSP about a month ago

I just discovered this forum decided to introduce my self:D

Also Here is a pretty cool picture i took

Edited June 25, 2015 by technicalfool
Fixed image embed ;>
Welcome, newcomer, to our glorious land of space exploration, SRB shenanigans, silly contraptions, Jeb, Bill, Bob and Valentina are awaiting for your guidance!
Welcome aboard Cool200! I like the look of that miniature rapier-powered space plane. Cool stuff!
Greetings! I hope you have fun playing KSP and on this forum! To the best of luck to you!

Hi Cool200

it was about time to joy KSP, and from your minimalistic and well reasonable craft i can see you are in the right place .

Size doesnt matter, we are all (or at least the most...) worshipping a funny god called Kra... errm deltavee.

Long live your Kerbals!
